annotation_sentence: Yes, I can try. I have, um, headache. And I feel tired... very tired.

annotation_sentence: Um, when I sleep more, then I feel a bit better. But, uh, working make it more... uh, worse.

annotation_sentence: I think... no fever. But sometimes... I cough a little.

annotation_sentence: Uh, no medicine. Just, um, drink tea... ginger tea. My mom say it help.

annotation_sentence: No allergies... I think. Uh, not that I know.

annotation_sentence: Um, not very good. I eat little, not much hungry. Sleep... how to say... not deep?

annotation_sentence: Yes, a bit stress. Work is busy... um, many things to do.
